channel.title: [Class suggestion] Maid (cult)
channel.description:
Class: Maid (Cult)
Type: Social
Converts from: Social classes (50/50 chance on what class u will get)
Passive: Instinct - know if someone framed, watched over, or investigated you.
Day ability: Antagonise (x3) - When using the "rob" ability make your name not appear in the list of who it could be, And get replaced by a name of your choice
Day ability: Seduce (x4) - make somebody unable to vote for the day
Night ability: Cook (x3) - Occupy anyone who visits the cult
Night ability: Rob - steal something from someone, occupying them and giving them 4 names of who it could've been, (1 is correct)

item.title: [Class suggestion] Maid (cult)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
converts from what?
